name: Sinatra's Spinach
description: Sinatra loved this dish because it isn't fattening and he believed the olive oil was good for his voice.
keywords: gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, spinach
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup finely chopped red onion or other mild onion

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the spinach and place in a serving dish. Drizzle with the oil and toss to coat. Sprinkle with the onion.
